configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.messaging.experimental.receive-telemetry.enabled
configurations.description: Enables experimental receive telemetry, which will cause consumers to start a new trace, with only a span link connecting it to the producer trace.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.messaging.experimental.capture-headers
configurations.description: Allows configuring headers to capture as span attributes.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.aws-sdk.experimental-span-attributes
configurations.description: Enables experimental span attributes for AWS SDK instrumentation.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.aws-sdk.experimental-use-propagator-for-messaging
configurations.description: Determines whether the configured TextMapPropagator should be used to inject into supported messaging attributes (for SQS).

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.genai.capture-message-content
configurations.description: Determines whether Generative AI events include full content of user and assistant messages. Note that full content can have data privacy and size concerns and care should be taken when enabling this

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.aws-sdk.experimental-record-individual-http-error
configurations.description: Determines whether errors returned by each individual HTTP request should be recorded as events for the SDK span.

metrics.name: gen_ai.client.token.usage
metrics.description: Measures number of input and output tokens used.
